submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, h: List[int], v: List[int]) -> int:
        h_cnt, v_cnt = 1,1
        h.sort(reverse=True)
        v.sort(reverse=True)
        hi,vi = 0,0
        res = 0
        while hi < m - 1 or vi < n - 1:
            if hi >= m - 1:
                res += v[vi] * h_cnt
                v_cnt += 1
                vi += 1
            elif vi >= n - 1:
                res += h[hi] * v_cnt
                h_cnt += 1
                hi += 1
            elif v[vi] > h[hi]:
                res += v[vi] * h_cnt
                v_cnt += 1
                vi += 1
            else:
                res += h[hi] * v_cnt
                h_cnt += 1
                hi += 1
        
        return res
